import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { registerClickAway } from '../helpers/click-away' import NavItem from './NavItem' import ProductsPanel from './ProductsPanel' export default function NavBar () { const [open, setOpen] = useState() function showMenu(menu) { setTimeout(() => { setOpen(menu) }, 0) } useEffect(() => { if (open) registerClickAway(() => { setOpen(null) }) }, [open]) return (
showMenu('tooling')} hasDropdown /> { open === 'tooling' && }
showMenu('learning')} hasDropdown /> { open === 'learning' && renderLearning() }
